name: Strike the Light
description:
Delve into a grim world, struck by constant rain and fog. Massive floodings laid waste to whole cities and drove mankind to adapt by using and relying on boats for traversal. Additionally a never-ending cover of thick clouds prevents almost all sunlight to grace the surface of the planet, resulting in darkly lit days, the blackest of nights and viciously freezing temperatures.

In this interactive Fiction,
experience two of the remaining people tackling the odds
in an unforgiving situation,
where your decisions are crucial for their survival.

New Update v0.15 is out now, adressing Visuals, UI, Dialogue and more!
See the full changelog here.

This Visual Novel was initially made in a 1-Week GameJam at the Uni "HAW Hamburg" and is my first in many regards, including developing a Visual Novel, using Ren'Py, creating a Plot with Characters, Story, Dialogue and Decisions and creating a completable Game in general.

Huge Thanks to Michael Benrad, Mareike Ottrand and fellow colleagues for valuable feedback, ideas and general support! <3

I truly hope you enjoy what I achieved so far ^_^
As I'm anxious to develop this even further, please let me know of any feedback, critique and ideas you can think of!
Also don't forget to rate and share as you please!

For more Updates and Content, be sure to follow my Socials.

And if you truly love what I do, you can support me on Patreon and Buy Me a Coffee!
